author: void.xyz
content: Will there be another round for the apprenticeship program?

author: pipermerriam
content: Unclear.  Probably not until the summer if so.  I'm not able to commit to continuing to run the program after this cohort finishes so we're looking for ways to continue running it without me at the helm.  I would still be involved in future cohorts, but as an advisor of sorts to people working on projects that were related to things that I'm familiar with (and with other core devs doing the same).

author: trent_vanepps
content: by summer, Piper means starting at the end of Q2 2022

author: taylorsmith1
content:
Hey everyone! It's super hard for me to come to the stand-ups due to my day-job and children, but I'm posting dev updates here: https://github.com/ethereum-cdap/cohort-one/blob/master/development-updates.md#taylor

TL;DR I'm hyperfocusing on zk-rollups that incorporate smart contracts. and the architecture/workflow. Delving into improving tech documentation that helps support L2 adoption and usability. Also, looking into tooling needed for L2 adoption like solidity->cairo compiler tools (like the  Warp project here: https://github.com/NethermindEth/warp)

author: _jmc_.
content:
Same for me - work trips and child have kept me from the last few meetings unfortunately but I am keeping my updates and hoping to make it next time. 

I am still working on a Rust beacon light client, but have diverted into building out the necessary ssz and merkle libraries. Also started reading up quite intensely on state/history expiry.

Cheers!
